name: SimpleHash
headline: Multi-chain NFT data platform
description:
SimpleHash allows developers to query all blockchain data from a single platform. We index multiple blockchains, take care of edge cases, and can be integrated in a few lines of code. We make the lives of developers working with token data easier by abstracting away all the complexity.

We serve some of the leading names in crypto, including Coinbase, Phantom and Uniswap. We're growing quickly, are well-funded, and have an ambitious vision to organize the world of digital assets.

Join us if you're excited by a high impact role on a lean, fast paced team at the forefront of the revolution in digital assets.

founders.name: Alex Kilkka, Founder
founders.description: Technical co-founder building NFT infrastructure at SimpleHash. Previously CTO at showtime.io, the NFT social network.

### [How Rainbow saved over $750k in NFT indexing costs with SimpleHash](https://www.simplehash.com/<blog/how-rainbow-saved-over-750k-in-nft-indexing-costs-with-simplehash>)
Learn how SimpleHash streamlined Rainbow’s customer experience by eliminating buggy workarounds and offering on-demand, white-glove service.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f16f96d7acc99e5e97b735/670944e05ffb5b512a8c676c_u0.jpg)](https://www.simplehash.com/<blog/uniswap-x-simplehash>)
### [Uniswap x Simplehash](https://www.simplehash.com/<blog/uniswap-x-simplehash>)
Uniswap is one of the pioneers of crypto - and SimpleHash is proud to be supporting them in their mission to make markets more transparent, global, and user-centric.
[![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/64f16f96d7acc99e5e97b735/65e6b418a13348b5f80930a9_d0.png)](https://www.simplehash.com/<blog/drip-the-simplehash-kafka-bulk-service>)
### [DRiP & The SimpleHash Kafka Bulk Service](https://www.simplehash.com/<blog/drip-the-simplehash-kafka-bulk-service>)
DRiP has been a pioneer of utilizing compressed NFTs on Solana - taking advantage of their low cost to facilitate large scale drops, at lower cost to creators, democratizing media creation. SimpleHash helps power their bulk Solana data needs.
## The most comprehensive source of Token data
Tokens & NFTs
    3B+
Uptime
    99.999%
Cross-Chain Schema
    1
All leading chains, and their testnets. 80+ total.

## One API. All the Token data you need. 
Enterprise SLAs
    The rapid support and SLAs you expect from a specialized provider.
Multi-chain native
    Avoid ecosystem lock-in with a common schema across chains.
DEX Coverage
    Real-time token price updates for all the main pools.
REST APIs & Streaming
    Flexible REST APIs, Webhooks and a Kafka Streaming Service for any use case.
Sales, floor prices, listings & bids
    Full transaction history, primary mints, plus pricing data across marketplaces.
Automatic metadata refreshing
    Metadata can change frequently with reveals and updates - we stay on top of it with our refreshing engine.
Cached media previews
    Dynamically sized image previews, blurhashes, and conversions to easy to handle formats.
Spam scores
    Filter out undesirable NFTs with collection spam scores.
> “SimpleHash helps us deliver great NFT experiences. We’ve partnered with them because we trust their ability to stay at the forefront of NFT standards and use cases.”

> ![](https://cdn.simplehash.xyz/landing_page/logos/partydao-quote-icon.jpg)

> ![](https://cdn.simplehash.xyz/landing_page/logos/bright-moments-quote-logo.jpg)
> [Henry PyeBright Moments](https://www.simplehash.com/<https:/www.brightmoments.io/>)
### Integrate effortlessly with your app
REST API, Webhooks, and Kafka. We've got you covered.
`# Get an NFT by chain, contract, and token_id`
``curl` `--request` GET `--url `"https://api.simplehash.com/api/v0/nfts/chain/contract_address/token_id"` --header ` 'X-Api-Key: xxx'`
`# Get an NFT by owner`
``curl` `--request` GET `--url `"https://api.simplehash.com/api/v0/nfts/owners?chains=optimism&wallet_addresses=0x001"` --header ` 'X-Api-Key: xxx'`
Backed by the best

## By developers, for developers
SimpleHash is built by a team with deep crypto-native expertise. We're here to help you deliver exceptional experiences for your users.
We've built products and led teams at some of the world's leading companies.

## Frequently asked questions
Which chains does SimpleHash support?
Does SimpleHash support fungible tokens?
Does SimpleHash support NFT sub-collections?
Can I query lazy minted NFTs?
Which DEXes does SimpleHash support?
Which NFT marketplaces does SimpleHash cover?
How does SimpleHash handle chain re-orgs?
Does SimpleHash support dynamic NFT refreshes and updates?
Can I download entire collections or chains of token data?
Does SimpleHash index all Fungible Tokens?
Does SimpleHash index all NFTs?
Can new chains, endpoints or capabilities be requested?
How quickly does SimpleHash ingest new Token data and events?

## One API. All the Token data you need. 
Enterprise SLAs
    The rapid support and SLAs you expect from a specialized provider.
Multi-chain native
    Avoid ecosystem lock-in with a common schema across chains.
DEX Coverage
    Real-time token price updates for all the main pools.
REST APIs & Streaming
    Flexible REST APIs, Webhooks and a Kafka Streaming Service for any use case.
Sales, floor prices, listings & bids
    Full transaction history, primary mints, plus pricing data across marketplaces.
Automatic metadata refreshing
    Metadata can change frequently with reveals and updates - we stay on top of it with our refreshing engine.
Cached media previews
    Dynamically sized image previews, blurhashes, and conversions to easy to handle formats.
Spam scores
    Filter out undesirable NFTs with collection spam scores.

### Integrate effortlessly with your app
REST API, Webhooks, and Kafka. We've got you covered.
`# Get an NFT by chain, contract, and token_id`
``curl` `--request` GET `--url `"https://api.simplehash.com/api/v0/nfts/chain/contract_address/token_id"` --header ` 'X-Api-Key: xxx'`
`# Get an NFT by owner`
``curl` `--request` GET `--url `"https://api.simplehash.com/api/v0/nfts/owners?chains=optimism&wallet_addresses=0x001"` --header ` 'X-Api-Key: xxx'`

generated_description:
### SimpleHash: A Game-Changer in NFT Data

**Company Overview**
SimpleHash is a promising startup in the crypto space, founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator Batch W22. Based in San Francisco, the company operates at the intersection of digital assets and developer tools. Their mission? To create a multi-chain NFT data platform that simplifies access to blockchain data for developers.

**The Problem They Solve**
Developers often grapple with the complexities of querying blockchain data. SimpleHash addresses this by providing a unified API that abstracts away the challenging aspects of data retrieval across multiple blockchains. This allows developers to integrate high-quality token and NFT data with just a few lines of code, streamlining their processes and enhancing efficiency.

**Key Features**
- **Cross-Chain Compatibility**: Access data from 80+ blockchains, ensuring no developer is locked into a single ecosystem.
- **Instant APIs**: Get real-time token prices, metadata, and media across various platforms—including major players like Coinbase, Phantom, and Uniswap.
- **Robust Infrastructure**: With 99.999% uptime, SimpleHash is designed for reliability and speed.
  
**Trusted by Industry Leaders**
Some of their notable clients include Coinbase, Uniswap, and Phantom—an indicator that they’re gaining traction within the cryptocurrency ecosystem. As they continue to grow quickly with solid backing from investors, SimpleHash is well-positioned to redefine how developers interact with digital assets.

**A Team of Experts**
SimpleHash is helmed by a talented team with deep expertise in crypto and SaaS development, bringing insights from leading companies like Google and McKinsey. They leverage this background to create solutions that precisely meet developer needs.

**Join the Revolution**
SimpleHash is not just another API provider; they are building infrastructure that supports the complete evolution of digital assets. If you're a developer looking for a comprehensive solution in the NFTs and crypto arena, check out their platform [here](https://www.simplehash.com). Whether you want to explore their API, read case studies, or just get inspired by their innovative approach, SimpleHash offers a wealth of opportunities at the forefront of the digital asset revolution.
